Setting.Name: ProviderName
Setting.Help: Sets the menu provider used to render the action menu, defaults to SolpartMenuNavigationProvider

Setting.Name: PopulateNodesFromClient
Setting.Help: Sets whether to use AJAX to render the action menu

Setting.Name: ExpandDepth
Setting.Help: Sets the depth of the menu. Needs to be set at least to 1 in order for the menu to render

Setting.Name: PathSystemScript
Setting.Help: Optional override location for the scripts that drive the menu
